name: Alien Task Force
description:
HOW MANY WAVES CAN YOU SURVIVE.

Play as a mercenary whos job is to clear planets of infestations of aliens in this Third Person wave based shooter. Choose from a variety of weapons to eliminate them but be careful as you have limited ammo to survive. In this wave based game you have bosses every 10 waves. There is a shop after every wave to purchase Health, Ammo and Upgrades. It has 4 different difficulties Easy, Normal, Hard or Insane with leaderboards. So be a Victor and show everyone how far you could survive. 😉





All money paid into this game will be put back into it or our other projects.
